text: Lyle L. Hanson (May 11, 1935 â€“ December 23, 2020) was an American politician and educator. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Hanson was a member of the North Dakota House of Representatives, representing the 12th district from 1979 to 2013. Hanson was born in Sargent County, North Dakota. Hanson died on December 23, 2020 in Jamestown, North Dakota, aged 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from North Dakota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from North Dakota
title: Lyle Hanson
